component.name: TCPU
component.version: CMO内部使用，商用发布不用关注，设备不会显示

features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新提升系统稳定性，合入安全补丁，推荐您进行更新。
• 提升系统稳定性，让您的智慧屏运行更稳定。
• 合入安全补丁，增强智慧屏系统安全。
Dear user, this update enhances the system stability and incorporates a security patch. Update to enjoy the improvements.
• Improves the system stability for more consistent performance of your Vision.
• Incorporates a security patch to enhance Vision security.
